favourite.article: Praise the Lord for the flow within us! All we want is God's Zoe life to fill us today!

Wow. Lord, three lives in me but one for You. Cause me to treasure the Zoe. Oh it's God in Christ Jesus through the Spirit today who is flowing in us. We don't care for bios, we don't want psuche, all we want is God's Zoe life to fill us today.
